about_the_game:
Long has incense ceased to rise; the gods lie cold, unseen,
A trace endures—a whisper faint—where hallowed halls convene.
These ancient gods bear no mercy’s grace; all life to them is base,
As lowly ants beneath their gaze, in a heedless, empty land.

 

The living toil in ritual grim, to cast off flesh-bound chains,
To shed the brittle, frail confines of earthly form and pains.
Yet all the world sinks, madness-bound, where chaos roams unchained,
And life itself lies captive here, by broken minds restrained.

 

Amidst low, endless chants beneath the Pantheon’s throne, you open your stone eyes. With that awakening, a fierce urge stirs within—to set heretic cults aright.

In The Eastern Sacrifice, ascend to godhood, restore humanity's honor!

Establish a religion that reveres you, rise and reclaim!

In the grand hall, you lower your gaze upon the fearful crowd, casting your first commanding sight.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dominion Over Mortals in Séance

You will begin the game as the Fallen One. Command fanatics to build shelters upon the ancient ruins, restoring prosperity. Send disciples to explore untamed lands, vanquishing demons along the way.

Though the cost of ascension to godhood is immense, each new tier unlocked grants you a new theurgy, amplifying the power of your every click.

 

Sandbox Building in Idle Game

30+ Industrial and Functional Buildings: A sandbox-style home-building system. Transform the deserted, forgotten mountain sect into a sprawling  sanctuary of immense power.

15+ Production Systems: Unlock policies and technologies to enable automated management of fanatics and production lines. Gain rewards through incremental management—easily idle and continue collecting resources even offline.

Explore, Combat, and Divine Intervene

Unlock new features and theurgies to enlighten your disciples, transforming these mere mortals into powerful vindicators! As they venture forth to expand your domain, you’ll easily oversee every aspect of growth.

When disciples encounter the fiercest foes, step in with divine intervention and possession—vanquish the enemy with your own hand. And remember—make use of theurgy and your finely-honed clicking prowess.

Sacrifice, Ascend, and Reincarnate

In this fiercely competitive post-apocalyptic world, the ascension rite grants you massive global boosts and, after reincarnation, a more prosperous world awaits.

But the rite demands a heavy toll: it welcomes human sacrifice and suffering without exception. This also draws the attention of the old gods, whose wrath will follow you into the next cycle.

 

Ascension rites are varied, please choose your principle and authority benefits wisely. But most importantly, it is the right sacrifices you must choose with utmost care…

short_description: “The Eastern Sacrifice” is an idle game combining simulation with Eastern Cthulhu-inspired themes. In a world spiraling into chaos over authority, vanquish enemy, gather treasures, and build a devoted religion. Your sanctuary will help you reclaim theurgy, ascend to the divine realm.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese*, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
